title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published to npm as `ollama`.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API, available on PyPI as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (`langchain-ollama`) exposing chat, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models, packaged as a single Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting, managing models, and inspecting logs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for integrating Ollama models into Rails or standalone scripts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama and optional WebUI onto Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform) constructs to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-express-bridge
summary: Lightweight Express middleware that exposes an OpenAI-compatible endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that adds a chat interface widget powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-terraform-provider
summary: Experimental Terraform provider to manage Ollama models and prompts as code.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio.
